int gigabitEthernet 1/0
ip address 192.168.0.6 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit 

int gigabitEthernet 2/0
ip address 192.168.0.9 255.255.255.252 
no shut
exit

ip route 192.168.0.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.0.5
ip route 192.168.0.12 255.255.255.252 192.168.0.10
ip route 192.168.0.20 255.255.255.252 192.168.0.10
ip route 192.168.0.20 255.255.255.252 192.168.0.5
ip route 192.168.0.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.0.10
ip route 192.168.0.12 255.255.255.252 192.168.0.5
